landingPage.name: Maciek Iwaniuk.
landingPage.description: I am fullstack developer, not afraid of learning new things. Currently I am studying in Secondary Technical School of Electrical Engineering in Bialystok. I associate my future with the IT industry.

zse.title: Secondary Technical School of Electrical Engineering in Bialystok
zse.content: Thanks to my education at this institution, I have gained a basic understanding of computer science. I broadened my horizons with knowledge of databases, development of desktop and web applications.

merinosoft.content: I participate in the development of an advanced web application related to the management of employees of a sizable companies. I modify the operation, appearance of various functionalities. I search, debug and eliminate bugs.
